QuestData.Title: Pound of Flesh
QuestData.Description:
Automa remove threats to us. But there are no more automa. We must help ourselves. We need magic.
Devourers ate the orb magic. Now they are warped and twisted. But also full of magic.
Bring us devourer flesh. We will extract the magic. We will need it to defeat the devourers.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect $1oa Warped Flesh from devourers at Zovaal's Grasp.
QuestData.RewardText:
This is the flesh $n gathered?
<The jiro sorts through the gooping mass of meat.>
It will have to do.
